content: super sweet coasters that will make every cuppa that extra bit fancy and happy quick to whip up and great for stash busting ideal for gifting or market stall stock one of the design variants is available for free on my blog pattern details * recommended yarn dk/8 ply/cat 3 weight yarn ~10g/0 35oz per coaster worsted yarn may also be used however coasters will be bigger than the size listed below any fibre/yarn that is easy to wash and does not readily pill such as cotton cotton blends easy wash wool and non-pill acrylic * hook size use yarn label instructions as a guide for selecting hook size swatch to determine the optimal hook size for your gauge * coaster size varies with chosen yarn and design variant however approximate size of coasters made in dk yarn 11 5-14cm/4 5-5 5in in diameter * skill level intermediate * stitch terminology us refer to abbreviations and special stitch instructions * gauge not required/not important for this item * pattern synopsis constructed in the round commencing with a circle rounds 1 to 3 construct the flower inner circle and then rounds 4 to 6 depending on design option construct the petals instructions are provided for both an unstructured coaster on this blog with five rounds in total and a structured coaster in pattern pdf with up to six rounds in total * social media share please tag me @thecrochetfix and hash tag your projects #springblingcoasters many thanks to the following testers for testing this design * tania barry @shewgirlscrochetcreations on ig shewgirl on ravelry * mary anne guarini @mguarini on ravelry * sheela bijea @sheelabijea on ig kaikelasa on ravelry * ritha vishwanath ritha on ravelry * shannon maughan @the crafty runner on ig thecraftyrunner on ravelry * richelle cricks @richellecricks on ig richelle362 on ravelry * leisa tolhurst
